That was supposed to be weather, sorry everyone, my mistake...
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Frid=
ay, July 07, 2000 4:27 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Hello, Wrath, =
nice (w)eather we're having, huh?" Stranato said, smiling at Wrath, trying =
to be nice even though he really wanted to insult him...
    ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:07 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *=
Infectra nodded and looked around not really knowing who to choose*

    *T=
hen Wrath steps out of the CR Chamber and see's The Radicons with Infectra =
and walks up to them*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECO=
DE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 3:26 AM=

      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "Whomever seems friendliest." Ai=
rbomber replied to Infectra...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
  From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thur=
sday, July 06, 2000 9:01 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        I=
nfectra: Okay, umm....which one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
          Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "Well, you shall be amazed at how much =
Liono screwed up the future, but you should go and get aquainted with some =
of the other bots." Airbomber said to Infectra...
            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
            =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Infectra nodded and looked aroun=
d* Infectra: What should I expect to happen or find out here? *Infectra say=
s to The Radicons*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
  From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: =
Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

              "Give them a chance, I'm sure they'll like you." Airbomber w=
hispered back to Infectra...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
                S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Infectra smiles waves to any =
bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra whis=
pers to Airbomber*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
          From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
          Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
                  Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber s=
aid, making sure nobody was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

          =
        "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber said. P=
lintissa growled.

                  "These Radicons fired at me, Artist, a=
nd Dracona when we tried to help them and ran away! I don't think they coul=
d be trusted!" Plintissa said.

                  "We have our gestalt form=
 and we're useful and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angri=
ly...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
 From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
             Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
                    Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *Infectra nods and follows the=
 Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectr=
a says to the Radicons*
                      ----- Original Message ----- =

                      From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                      Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
       =
               Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                      Sinesis and =
Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the other loo=
ked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other, but =
they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

                   =
   Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked off to th=
e Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

                      "Hey, have=
 any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dracona=
 started to look around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

          =
            Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drinking tea =
and they left again.

                      "Who shall we join with, dear?"=
 Inzola asked.

                      "Whomever wants out assistance." Deem=
os replies. They walk on until they see the Alliance base.

               =
       "This one looks good, lets go and ask them if they have any need for=
 us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the base.

              =
        "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join your fine team, we have=
 been looking for a faction to join, and it appears that it is you who will=
 obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, what fo we have =
to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, no killing a b=
ot things or anything.)

                      Gangon had a nightmare, He w=
as again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him=
. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled of their masks an=
d were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon screame=
d and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he couldn=
't move. He considered that thing about getting a replacement body, how it =
would be a good idea just in case he had to get out of this dump, which was=
 probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona=
 to come back.

                      The Radicons looked at Infectra.

   =
                   "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we have set you o=
n friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how you would=
 make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They walked inside =
of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

                     =
 Artist walked around the war room in circles, not quite knowing where he w=
as going.



--------------------------------------------------------------=
----------------



-------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------
